channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2024111055
item.description:
Report X-2024111055

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-30T12:29:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-15
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared hazmat found during screening. Other undeclared hazmat found with no release as follows. (Replicating questions 14-29) Isopropanol or Isopropyl alcohol//haz class 3 // UN 1219//not shipped as hazardous waste//not toxic by inhalation//not shipped under Exemption, Approval, or CA number//shipment was undeclared with no release//packaging type non-bulk/outer packaging plastic box//

item.title: Report X-2024111053
item.description:
Report X-2024111053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-30T12:29:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-01
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: 2 bags on a pallet, screened through X-Ray. I saw some opaque square shaped items that I thought might be undeclared batteries. I got a second opinion from my lead and did a targeted physical search. Found two lithium ion rechargeable power banks in the bigger bag.

item.title: Report X-2024111030
item.description:
Report X-2024111030

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-29T12:39:13+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-31
  • City: ANCH
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When screening thru x-ray, I saw 2 cans that looks like propane. There was no declaration on the outer packing. So I perform target physical search and was able to found 2 cans of highly flammable liquid 520 Adhesive. 2 cans weight 2 pounds total. I remove the 2 haz from the shipment and clear the other non-haz for air transport.

item.title: Report X-2024110939
item.description:
Report X-2024110939

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-26T12:24:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-17
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was discovered leaking and emitting a strong odor of gasoline during sort operations. Outer packaging: fiberboard box non specification. Inner contents: 1 plastic bottle of a brown liquid (7P-0200 Corvel Primer) in bubble wrap, surrounded by brown paper. The SDS was inside the box: UN 1993 Flammable Liquid NOS (Contains Tolulene and Ethanol), PGII. The shipment was placed in a salvage drum and held for FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2024110844
item.description:
Report X-2024110844

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-25T12:24:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-12
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On November 12th 5 packages was searched by Customs and was discovered to contain undeclared DG. The commercial invoice stated chess pieces, however the package contained bottles of perfume, UN1266, Perfumery products, 3, III. The packages were returned to the FedEx Station and are being held pending investigation by the FAA.

item.title: Report X-2024110838
item.description:
Report X-2024110838

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-25T12:24:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-12
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On Nov 12th this package was inspected by customs as part of their routine searches. The jerrican inside states that it is silicone oil, and ther eare no markings or labels on the outside that state otherwise. Customs performed a field test on the chemical and determined that is is actually UN1294, Toluene, 3, II. The package was returned to the FedEx Station and is being held pending an FAA investigation for undeclared dangerous goods.
